page.title: 02POPULATION Questionnaire
page.content: To help our Domesday Project work we decided to ask people a lot of questions.We discussed this in class and drew up a questionnaire which we printed on our computer.The class distributed 750 copies throughout Walgrave and Hannington and then collected them about a week later Here are the results; Q.1) We asked where people were born.We had 351 replies.69 were born in the village.114 were born in the county of Northamptonshire and 168 were born elsewhere ranging from Canada to South Africa. Q.2) We asked if they had attended Walgrave School.We had 352 answers.257 people had not attended and 95 people had attended Walgrave School. Q.3) We asked if their parents attended Walgrave School.We had 327
